modalPhraseOne: Do you need a <1>website</1>? An <3>app</3> for <5>Android</5> or <7>iOS</7>?
modalPhraseContactMe: Simply contact me by E-Mail and we will discuss your idea together!
serviceWebDesc: Development of web pages usable on any type of device through new development technologies such as <1>ReactJS</1> or <3>VueJS</3>.
serviceWebFeatureOne: Website ready immediately to be indexed in major search engines
serviceWebFeatureTwo: Choosing the most convenient hosting together with the customer
serviceWebFeatureThree: PWA capability: state-of-the-art websites that allow you to use them offline
serviceAppDesc: Develop native cross-platform applications (i.e. usable on both Android and Apple devices) using <1>React Native</1>
serviceAppFeatureOne: Application immediately usable by both devices with Android and Apple devices (iOS and iPadOS)
serviceAppFeatureTwo: Faster development process since the product is now cross-platform, therefore without the need to develop two apps separately
serviceAppFeatureThree: Simple, modern and clear graphical interfaces to provide a better user experience
